head_office_address: Cedar House, 2 St John's Road Cirencester
eu_initiatives: Members of EFFSACO are managing projects for the registration of feed additives and are often in contact with the Standing Committee of Animal Nutrition, discussion about the implication of regulations on the registration of feed additives.
organisation_name: European Federation of Food Safety Consultants (EFFSACO)
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
relevant_communication: The discussions often concern about the consequences of regulations on the registration of feed additives and are confidential
goals__remit:
EFFSACO members manage projects related to the registration of feed additives. They investigate the necessities to prepare dossiers, organise necessary studies and often represent feed additive companies for the communication with EFSA and the European authorities 
The goal of EFFSACO is to contribute to sensible regulations, good procedures for the registration process and science-based EFSA guidances, in order to support the registration process leading to the registration of safe feed additives.
